70010000083204.description:
Enter a universe filled with challenges and excitement in Galaxy Kingdoms, a pixel art adventure game that promises to capture your heart and imagination. As Magnus, a skilled Bounty Hunter, you will begin your journey in Greenhaven, completing missions to earn money and explore new planets.

With the help of your trusty guide Kyra, you'll travel in your ship to discover amazing planets and face formidable enemies. Each mission brings you closer to great rewards and new challenges. Explore planets like Stellara, Baobynia, Crystalia, Volcanoscorch, and East Crystalia, each with its own threats and mysteries.

Don't miss the chance to explore galaxies, fight against threats, and become the greatest Bounty Hunter in the universe!
70010000083204.intro: Explore planets, face monsters, and conquer riches in Galaxy Kingdoms!
70010000083204.name: Galaxy Kingdoms

70010000085147.description:
STORY:
Aihama, Japan. The final years of the Edo period. One rain-drenched evening, a group of men burst into the town’s brother and sister-run umbrella shop. Yushin is cut down in front of his sister Yui, leaving her alone in the world. The next thing he knows, he is looking down at his own stricken corpse—a soul without a body. The grim incident shatters the peace in this quiet backwater. Lurking beneath the surface is an intricate, deep-rooted plot, shrouded in mystery. Until Yui is safe, not even death is enough to extinguish Yushin’s soul. He'll stop at nothing on his quest, shifting from body to body, possessing anyone and anything to rescue his sister. But with just seven days before his soul departs this world—can he save Yui in time? 
This is a tale of rain, reincarnation, and revenge.

GAME FEATURES:
Soul-Shifting Showdowns: Lacking a physical form, you'll need to shift your soul to other bodies on the quest to find your sister. Possession puts you in complete control of whoever and whatever you inhabit, giving you access to a variety of weapons and fighting styles. Depending on your current body, you'll face different foes and encounter new faces on your incorporeal journey.

Inclement Intrigue: This human drama plays out against the rain-soaked backdrop of mid 19th century Japan, rendered in an evocative pixel style. In the sombre world of AMEDAMA, beauty and darkness are two sides of the same coin.

Reincarnation, Repercussions: As you relive the same seven day period over and over again, your choices will impact the story unfolding around you. Who will you speak to? How will you intervene? The decisions, and the outcomes, are all up to you.

Counteraction using the sword technique of Usetsu Tensei sword style: Where Yushin, having mastered the key to battles, employs the technique known as 'Misty Riposte.' By countering the opponent's attacks, significant damage is dealt in a counteraction.


Development / Marketing: IzanagiGames
Planning: ACQUIRE
Character design: lack (Fate/Grand Order, Touken Ranbu)
Soundtrack: Yuko Komiyama (Monster Hunter series)
70010000085147.intro: Side-scrolling, soul-shifting sandbox action adventure brought to life with a striking new 2D style!
70010000085147.name: AMEDAMA

70010000087269.description:
Use your powers of sorcery to fend off waves of fiendish enemies in top-down pixel art arenas!

Spellagis is a survival shooter where you take the role of a mage beset by swarms of blobs, snakes, ghosts, maggots and more. Wield your staff and fire magical projectiles to slay your foes, then collect coins they drop to buy items from the shop to keep stacking the deck in your favor, from spell enhancements and protective summons to food for quick health boosts. Destroy barrels in the arena for random potions and stacks of coins! Just always stay on your toes or enemy hordes will box you in.

Will you become the most powerful mage as you fight to survive, or will you succumb to the onslaught?

Features:

• Survive waves of enemies in top-down arena combat!
• Cast spells in twin-stick shooter style as you evade incoming attacks.
• Destroy barrels and collect coins!
• Buy items from the shop to aid you in combat!
• Earn perpetual upgrades to stack the deck in your favor for subsequent runs.
• Enjoy old-school pixel art aesthetics!
70010000087269.intro: Grow your magic skills to survive relentless waves of enemies in twin-stick shooter style!
70010000087269.name: Spellagis

70010000043266.description:
Welcome aboard the Reuss Express, a journey of a life-time derailed by an unexpected assassination. 

On the eve of a landmark speech by the wealthy heiress Lady Unterwald, a straight-laced lawyer, a crime novelist-turned rookie detective, and an undercover spy find themselves embroiled in a murder, a mystery, and worst of all... an adventure! 

Now stuck onboard a luxurious steam train, within stabbing distance of a cold-blooded killer, the race is on to prove their innocence once and for all! 

Play as Diana, Arthur and Herman to unwrap the mystery and put your point and click puzzle-solving skills to the test...

■ A comedy adventure that hits like smooth jazz, set onboard a 1930s express train
■ Take control of three playable characters, in an interlinking comedic adventure
■ Uncover a deadly mystery, full of twists, turns and slapstick humour
■ Meet a train-full of quirky and somewhat suspicious fellow passengers 
■ Stop at nothing to solve item-based puzzles, that won’t leave you head scratching for hours
■ Choose how you play, by taking direct interactive character control, or opting for a classic point and click experience
■ Beautifully detailed pixel art animations
■ Need a little nudge in the right direction? Telephone for assistance with an in-game hint call-line!
■ Fully voice-acted!
70010000043266.name: Loco Motive

70010000075278.description:
The best game ever made about a guy in a rabbit costume jumping through wormholes. Embark on a challenging journey through time and space in search of something non-specific that will leave you with intense feelings of [INSERT STIRRING EMOTION HERE]!

Super Bunny Man is a chaotic co-op physics-based platformer where you use rolling, jumping, and grabbing to overcome challenges. Bring a friend. Beat levels, time attacks, enter wormholes, and find hidden carrots, all while evading spikes, boulders, pitfalls, and other challenges. Become Super Bunny Man!

Story Mode
Play solo or get together with a friend (local or online) for some carrot co-op mayhem! Traverse 50 challenging levels across different worlds: Forest, Snow, Cave, Beach and Stadium! 

Party Mode
• Multiplayer: up to 4 players! Online & Local!
• Deathmatch: kick your friends off cliffs, drag them onto spikes, break their necks! (Disclaimer: not recommended for fragile or strained friendships).
• Basketball: Choose a team, then fight to get the ball into your hoop!
• Carrot Grab: Strap on a jet pack and collect more carrots than the other team!

... and much, much more!
• Controller support for up to 4 players!
• Physics-based character and interactive world.
• Mind-blowing 2.5D computer-generated graphical images!
• Evocative musical soundtrack, with grooves so addictive they've been banned in dance clubs across the world!
• Unbelievable dance moves!

Embrace carrot chaos. Become Super Bunny Man today!
70010000075278.intro: Find hidden carrots and race against the clock. Experience bunny madness. Embrace carrot chaos. Become Super Bunny Man.
70010000075278.name: Super Bunny Man

70010000076216.intro: Who said being a courier is boring? Arrange xtreme city bike races and deliver the order on time!
70010000076216.name: Extreme City Delivery: Bike Ride Simulator

70010000081440.description:
"Divine Dynamo Flamefrit" is a 2D action game inspired by classic games and anime.
Play as the hero Yuto in top-down slashing adventure stages, and pilot the magical robot Flamefrit for first-person boss battles!
Master both styles of gameplay to restore peace to the parallel world of Hologard!

■A fantasy adventure refining the classics!
Yuto is a master of the sword and can unleash different attacks with a single button. Keep attacking for a 3-hit combo or charge a fiery spinning slash!
On defense, Yuto can also roll to avoid enemy attacks, and even counter them with a well-timed attack.

Find and recruit allies to summon them in battle for powerful magic attacks or help with dangerous traps.
Adventure through the magical realm of Hologard with your most trusted friends!

■Fight bosses with your allies in free-flowing first person battles!
Boss battles change the point of view completely to a first-person vantage.
Use the crosshairs to control Flamefrit and slash enemy magic out of the air, and slice and dice the foe when the they get near!
Guard well to charge up Flamefrit's power! Strike them down with the "Flame Saber!"

Call upon your friends in their Divine Dynamos for powerful one-time attacks as your trump cards.
Each ally you recruit will increase your fighting strength, so find as many as you can along your journey!

■New but nostalgic! Just like the old days!
With graphics that evoke a specific retro 16-bit era, players will feel right at home in the world of Hologard. Divine Dynamo Flamefrit strives for an authentic take on games and anime from the 90s.
Everything cool and classic you enjoyed from that era, you'll find it here!
70010000081440.intro: A fantastical adventure of magic and armor awaits!
70010000081440.name: Divine Dynamo Flamefrit

70010000081923.description:
Bounce and break everything as you roll downhill in this beautiful game!

Play normally for a relaxed experience or push your skills to the limit in hard mode. Destroy every object while maintaining momentum, exploding, bouncing, using power-ups, and avoiding all kinds of deadly obstacles.

Experience simple yet finely-tuned gameplay with numerous levels, secrets, and rewards to customize your hero.

Features:
Unlock over 100 items to customize your hero with different expressions, clothes, costumes, and accessories.
Learn how different objects react to your actions!
Play through 60 amazing levels.
Discover incredible power-ups!
Choose between two difficulty modes: Normal and Hard.
70010000081923.intro: Roll downhill with Super Rolling Heroes Deluxe
70010000081923.name: Super Rolling Heroes Deluxe

70010000082907.description:
A collaboration between writer Tomo Kataoka, the creator of CNGAL's Best Galgame of 2020 Christmas Tina, and Kohaku Sumeragi, a popular illustrator praised in Japan and around the world, they bring you the ultimate visual novel.

Visual novels aim to immerse players in captivating narratives and evoke empathy for the characters. The mechanics are simple, often requiring just a press of a button to progress, giving even first-time players an accessible and enjoyable experience.

In vibrant Kabukicho there is the expanding slum of Shinjuku Kowloon, which its peope call the district. The city is home to the poor, the outcast, and those exiled from society. 
All-devouring Shinjuku Kowoon grows on the lives and desires of its people.
The dead of the district are buried by Torao Hiira. What could be the reasons behind his strange behaviour?
70010000082907.intro: This is a story that questions the value of life...
70010000082907.name: SHINJUKU SOUMEI

70010000083567.description:
Lead four Time Walkers to torture the Dark Lord and his subordinates with more than 40 skills. Match different skill builds without class limits. Archer healer, assassin tank or wizard warrior? All up to you.

Choose four Heroes before battles, match them with different abilities to produce amazing chain reaction. Create your unique Time Walker every time you start!

Manage the resources you collect in every battle. Merge to get advanced abilities or Reforge to your luck.

Never ignore Talents. Unlock new heroes and abilities to give Dark Lord’s subordinates an impressive lesson.

Looking for more power? Try Advanced Heroes and EX Abilities! Merge three same basic hero items into an advanced one! Merge two Level III abilities into a moer powerful EX ability.

Time Walkers power will be stronger and stronger during the war against Dark Lord. Take them to the deep side and reveal Dark Lord’s plots!
70010000083567.intro: Time Walker Dark World is a roguelike auto-battler with strategic combat. Players will need to adjust their formations, plan their resources, acquire loot.
70010000083567.name: Time Walker: Dark World

70010000084300.description:
A cargo airplane crashed somewhere in the vast areas of the Amita mountain range. 
It was carrying a large shipment of beagles headed to the CutLab, a huge animal testing facility. 
The lab is upset about losing its precious testing material and is deploying a biohazard division determined to reclaim its "property". 
They operate under strict orders: seize usable specimens, dispose of the rest! 
We are sending our elite animal rescue squad to save as many dogs as possible before the lab's grunts confine them back to the life of endless misery. Go!

The game offers core gaming experience focused on score attacks and reaching high levels, paying homage to classic 8-bit era arcades. Play as Nicole or Edwin and rescue as many adorable doggies as possible. Overcome treacherous mountain terrain by parkouring, roping and parachuting in an intense, fast paced chase through colorful procedurally generated levels. Command owls and wield them as a weapon against a horde of biohazard dudes, vivisectors, lab executives and more. Upgrade your skills and consume wild goji berries to gain superpowers!

WARNING! The player can perish by falling from heights. 
It may happen a lot to rookies but resolute rescuers will prevail. 

You have been warned!

Features:
- Challenging yet flowy action inspired by classic 8-bit arcade games
- Unique gameplay based on scrolling parallax
- Stylish minimalist graphics
- Procedurally generated levels and color palettes, offering a lot of replay value and mood variation
- Shared screen two player Co-Op and PvP modes. Team up or compete with a friend
- Configurable PvP rules and winning conditions
- Skill system to boost your rescuing abilities as you advance through levels. It includes essential life skills such as Beagle Magnetism and Goji Berry Digestion
- Endless supply of beagles to rescue
70010000084300.intro: Rescue: The Beagles is a challenging platformer/runner with unique parallax based gameplay.
70010000084300.name: Rescue: The Beagles

70010000084681.description:
DELICIOUS ADVENTURE
Cook For Love is a cozy cooking game where you’ll be in the shoes of Clement – a young Frenchman, who gets hired at a popular Parisian restaurant. With the help of a recipe book, you will be able to cook unique dishes of varying complexity and conquer the world’s taste buds!


FROM NOVICE TO MAESTRO
Clement starts his mentorship under Jean-Luc Chatillone – a culinary legend… currently onboard the Orient Express. Even though he’s away, Jean-Luc’s recipe book lands in Clement’s hands.

You will be cooking with various kitchen appliances and using many different ingredients. With over 40 available recipes you have your path laid out in front of you – now it’s time to roll up your sleeves and cook until you earn the title of a true chef.


RECIPES FOR JOYFUL LIFE
As you learn how to cook new dishes you also earn reputation points, which in turn level up your chef experience. New recipes will be unlocked on the way and they will get more complex (and more delicious) as you go.

After everything’s ready there will be a final test… will the critics grant you the Golden Spoon, young chef?

Cook For Love is a look into the past of Grandma Rose’s husband – Clement, before he met his wife on the Orient Express. While this is not a prequel to Tell Me Your Story, it’s a look at the youth of these two lovebirds from another perspective.


HIGHLIGHTS:
- Over 40 various recipes to master…
- …and delicious pictures to look at.
- Cozy and stressless vibes.
- Learning how to make some of the most well-known recipes.
- Get to know Clement better long before he met Rose.
- Beautiful, hand-drawn art style with bright colors.
- English, Korean and Japanese subtitles and UI
70010000084681.intro: Win the hearts of Parisians with your cooking, discover delicious recipes, and become a chef worthy of working onboard the Orient Express.
70010000084681.name: Cook For Love

70010000085061.description:
Become a Dance Hero from Zero! 

Grab your Joy-Con™ controllers, and get your body moving to the beat! 
Learn popular hip-hop dance moves from basic to complex.
But you won't be alone on your dancing journey. Four instructors help along the way!

- Start off with the basics - Lesson Mode will take you through 30 lessons that will have you moving and grooving in no time!

- In Free Mode, put your dancing skills to the test, and follow your instructor through six original choreographed dances!

- Turn on Camera Mode and rotate the angle during lessons to see steps in detail!
70010000085061.name: Zero to Dance Hero

70010000085595.description:
Game Features:
+ 10 characters, 220 skills, 180 talents, over 400 equipments, and more than 200 equipment affixes. Plus, endless stage challenges that never stop!

+ Idle Gameplay: Enjoy a laid-back, stress-free experience where the game truly helps you unwind and relax. Even when you're taking a break, your devils will keep fighting, ensuring you continue to grow stronger.

+ Rich Loot and Equipment System:
During battles, every enemy you defeat has a chance to drop equipment. The equipment quality is determined by the stage level and treasure rank, with higher-quality equipment offering more diverse affixes. There’s even a chance to obtain exclusive, rare affixes to supercharge your power in combat!
70010000085595.intro: Summon your devils to form the ultimate devil squad! Watch your power grow every moment, even when you're away! Are you ready to become the new Devil King?
70010000085595.name: Idle Devils

70010000087100.description:
In a world where honey production is key to survival, the queen bee has tasked you, the most creative and skilled worker bee, with maintaining and expanding the hive’s honeycombs. But there’s a twist each honeycomb is a complex hexagonal puzzle, and only by arranging the honeycomb cells in perfect alignment can the nectar flow smoothly.

As you rotate, flip, and split the honey-filled hexagonal cells, your mission is to clear pathways (lines) to store honey efficiently. The more honeycombs you align at once, the greater your rewards in the form of golden nectar.

In the Classic Mode, maintain the hive's structure at your own pace, carefully planning each move. But in Time Trial Mode, race against the clock to ensure enough honey is collected before the day ends. Watch out in Bomb Mode, where rogue honey-bombs threaten to destroy your careful work. And if you're up for a real challenge, the Advance Mode will test your ultimate puzzle-solving skills with complex honeycomb arrangements.

With daily rewards for consistent work and global competition among bees, can you become the top worker and rise to the top of the Nintendo Switch™ global leaderboard?
70010000087100.name: Hakkakudoku

70010000087124.description:
The duel you've only dreamed of is finally a reality!
Battle it out with advanced original machines and stages, and claim victory for your team!

[Battle]
Select an army and defeat opponent after opponent!
Use your special move when in a jam to turn the tides of battle!

[Online]
Fight against the other side's forces and lead your army to victory!
You can also compete with your allies in the army participation ranking!
Enter a Room Match to battle with up to 4 friends!

[Customization]
With new additional parts, the combinations are limitless!
Create original erasers and rulers unique to you!
70010000087124.intro:
Which side will you choose?!
Eraser Army VS Ruler Army
The ultimate desktop showdown is about to begin!
70010000087124.name: Eraser VS Ruler

70010000087282.description:
You, the player, have somehow lost your human body and been turned into an ‘Ichimatsu doll’. In this action-adventure game, you must explore a traditional Japanese house to find a way to turn back to normal.

The general course of action is using hints to hunt down various items that will enhance your abilities.
You mustn’t allow yourself to be spotted by humans. If you feel you’re about to be seen, you can play dead like an inanimate doll.

Should you be spotted, run away as fast as you can. If you get caught, it's game over.
While you can’t fight against humans directly, some of the items you collect can be used to create poltergeist phenomena that can stun or distract them.
70010000087282.intro: A stealth action adventure in which you play as a Japanese traditional doll and explore the house without anyone finding you.
70010000087282.name: Ichima-san

70010000088105.description:
In Blackout, you are faced with the choice of going after the truth, facing the shadows that hide within our world, or trying to forget and leave all this behind.

Blackout is a non-linear interactive fiction game set in a dark modern universe, nfluenced by White Wolf’s World of Darkness, H.P. Lovecraft and weird shows like Twin Peaks. Walk the main character through his journey on trying to recollect his memories by making choices. Will you dig deeper into his past and unveil this whole new world hiding beneath the shadows? Or will you leave it all behind?

The path you take inside each chapter varies greatly, and the effect of your choices could ripple across all chapters, leading to completely different experiences on each new playthrough. Which of the endings will you reach?
70010000088105.intro: You have been part of something terrible, something so unspeakable that caused you to blackout and forget all the events from the past few days.
70010000088105.name: Blackout: The Darkest Night

70010000088736.description:
Everyone wants to eat you! Open the refrigerator door and run away. Avoid obstacles so you don't lose speed. 
Jump over stools, slip under chairs and run onto tables.   
Remember that a very hungry person is running after you and you can't stop. 
Collect coins and choose fun skins for each new run. Make big jumps, take sharp turns and find shortcuts. The main thing is not to stop and run!
70010000088736.intro: Don't let anyone eat you. Run to save your life!
70010000088736.name: Fridge Escape

70010000088869.description:
Car Mechanic Shop Simulator is a simulation game that offers a comprehensive, in-depth experience combining strategic business management with the technical nuances of car maintenance, making it a must download for enthusiasts and novices alike.

Build your auto parts kingdom:
Start your journey with a modest store and strategically grow it to become a leading destination for auto parts and accessories. Car Mechanic Shop Simulator lets you deal with everyday items such as oil filters, tires and brake pads, as well as high-performance components such as V8 OHV engine parts, advanced suspension systems and sophisticated electronics. Your decisions not only shape the operational aspect of your business, but also affect its financial health and reputation in the marketplace.

Master inventory management:
Develop your inventory management skills by handling a wide range of automotive parts, including alternators, clutch kits, radiators, exhaust systems and advanced electronic systems essential to modern vehicles. Learn to master the art of inventory control, optimize pricing strategies and respond to market demand. Watch your auto repair shop become a local industry leader known for efficiency and reliability.

Customize and grow your store:
As your business grows, you'll be tasked with expanding the physical space of your store to accommodate your growing inventory and expand the range of services you offer, from routine maintenance to specialized repairs and custom modifications.

Unlock new automotive parts and technologies:
Earn licenses to sell and install advanced parts that meet the diverse needs of car enthusiasts and professional repair shops. This feature ensures that your store stays at the forefront of innovation, offering the latest innovations in automotive technology, from hybrid engine components to autonomous vehicle systems.

Ensure customer satisfaction:
Excellent customer service is key to building a solid customer base that relies on your store for all their automotive needs, from simple oil changes to complex engine rebuilds.
70010000088869.name: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator

70010000088881.description:
Become a rookie flight attendant and embark on a thrilling career soaring through the skies! Ensure passenger safety and comfort on exciting global journeys. Navigate diverse situations – manage demanding passengers, respond to unforeseen emergencies, or maintain cabin order with grace. Your ability to adapt and excel under pressure will determine your success.

Features:
- Immersive Flight Experience: Experience the intricacies of cabin crew duties with detailed aircraft interiors and realistic flight mechanics, offering an immersive simulation of the aviation world.
- Dynamic Gameplay: Confront a variety of challenges, from managing passenger needs to handling in-flight emergencies, in a dynamic simulation that tests your skills and decision-making abilities.
- Career Progression: Advance through the ranks of the aviation industry as your performance on each flight influences your reputation and unlocks new opportunities and responsibilities.
- Customization Options: Personalize your character and uniform to showcase your individual style, allowing you to leave a lasting impression on passengers and colleagues alike.
- Realistic Simulation: Engage in the day-to-day responsibilities of a flight attendant, from conducting safety procedures to attending to passenger requests, in a true-to-life simulation of the profession.
70010000088881.intro: Welcome Aboard! Fasten Your Seatbelt—It’s Going to Be a Thrilling Ride!
70010000088881.name: Flight Attendant Simulator: Onboard Tasks

70010000089193.description:
Item: SCP-087
Object Class: Euclid

Special Containment Procedures:
Access to SCP-087 is restricted to authorized personnel with Level 3 security clearance. Exploration sessions within SCP-08 are limited to a maximum duration of 60 minutes and are to be conducted using D-Class personnel for exploration purposes.

Details:
SCP-087 refers to an anomalous structure that appears to resemble a stairwell. Attempts to reach the end of the stairwell have been unsuccessful, with subjects reporting an oppressive atmosphere upon entering the structure. Auditory hallucinations, specifically the sound of distant and distressed voices, are frequently reported by those who explore SCP-087. Light sources do not function effectively beyond a few meters within the structure, as the surrounding darkness appears to absorb any illumination.

Document 087-0:
This document details the initial efforts to investigate SCP-087 using D-Class personnel.
70010000089193.name: SCP-087 THE STAIRWELL HORROR

70010000089282.description:
You are the Servonauts - a team of dedicated, enthusiastic and utterly replaceable service station attendants. Work together with your friends to refine fuel, build pipelines and manage mayhem in many exotic locations throughout the galaxy.

Refine Fuel
When cars pull into your servo, they’ll request specific kinds of fuels. Build machines to refine this fuel, and combine fuels to make advanced recipes! But be careful - pumping the wrong fuel can have *explosive* consequences.
Astroil does not offer compensation for injuries related to employee mishaps.

Build a Pipeline
To pump these cars, you’ll need Astroil’s patent-pending pipe technology! These wobbly, physically-simulated pipes can bend and stretch to get fuel where you need it. They’re even partially lava-resistant (unlike the Servonauts)!

Up to Four Player Co-op
Play in single-player with in-game support or grab your mates to jam it out as a duo, trio, or chaotic 4 player quartet. Work with your team and optimise your logistics as you aim to collect all three Gold Stars. Will this mean the Servonauts finally get a vacation? (Don’t be ridiculous…)

Game supports local couch coop. 

Are you Astroil's next Employee of the Month? Then get ready to launch!
70010000089282.intro: Servonauts is an absurd couch co-op gas station builder for 1-4 players!
70010000089282.name: Servonauts

70010000089319.description:
Soar into the skies with Jet Combat: Cats VS Dogs Military Simulator, where the age-old rivalry between cats and dogs takes flight in this high-octane aerial combat game. Choose your side in this epic battle as either a daring dog or a cunning cat pilot, and dive into action-packed missions that will test your skills in the clouds.

Key Features:

- Choose Your Faction: Fly as a fearless canine or a stealthy feline pilot, each with unique aircraft and abilities.
- Dynamic Combat: Engage in thrilling dogfights using a diverse arsenal of aircraft, from agile fighters to powerful bombers.
- Multiple Game Modes: Master the solo campaign or challenge other players in explosive multiplayer arenas.
- Rich Progression System: Earn ranks and medals to unlock new aircraft, skins, and special maneuvers.
- Stylized Worlds: Battle across beautifully rendered skies and landscapes that offer both visual splendor and strategic depth.
- Customization Options: Give your pilot a personal touch with custom skins, upgrades, and abilities.
- Interactive Soundtrack: Enjoy a soundtrack that captures the spirit of this wild cat vs. dog rivalry.

Prepare for take-off in Jet Combat: Cats VS Dogs Military Simulator and claim the skies in the furriest flight combat game ever. Download now and unleash your inner ace in this ultimate battle of paws and claws!
70010000089319.intro: Choose your side and rule the skies!
70010000089319.name: Jet Combat: Cats VS Dogs Military Simulator

70050000053151.description:
This AOC is only available to players who purchased the game as a physical package. Digital download version players cannot use this AOC.

---

Wizard attire with red and white contrasts. It's used in magical rituals and demands a degree of decorum.
70050000053151.intro: Red Berry White & Red Berry Blossom
70050000053151.name: [For Physical Package] Costume - Red Berry Set

70050000053152.description:
This AOC is available only to players who purchased the game as a physical package. We kindly ask you to verify this information before making a purchase, as players with the digital download version will not be able to access this AOC.

---

A dress that represents the twinkling stars of the violet morning sky.
70050000053152.intro: Shining Dawn Princess & Shining Dawn Angel
70050000053152.name: [For Physical Package] Costume - Shining Dawn Set

70070000025334.description:
The Hidden Shy Cats & Dogs Bundle brings together two delightful hidden-object games that are all about music, animals, and heartwarming discoveries!

In Shy Cats Hidden Orchestra, explore beautiful, hand-drawn scenes to uncover shy feline musicians. Each hidden cat adds a new instrument, letting you create unique melodies as you build your cat orchestra!

In Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra, the fun continues with adorable puppies hiding in various vibrant settings. Find these bashful musician dogs to unlock more sounds and craft your own doggy symphony!

Enjoy relaxing gameplay as you search, find, and build your musical ensembles in these cozy, animal-themed adventures! Perfect for hidden-object fans and anyone who loves cute animals and soothing melodies.
70070000025334.intro: Find shy musician cats and dogs in this charming bundle! Enjoy cozy hidden-object gameplay as you discover adorable animals and create your own musical mix!
70070000025334.name: Hidden Shy Cats & Dogs Bundle

70010000073731.description:
Fight your way home using a variety of weapons, guns, and Spirit Cards. Capture and summon demons as your allies in battles to defeat the Queen of Inferno.

Lost in the inferno, you are a demon hunter who accidentally got teleported to this demon's realm. Now, you must unite with your allies and find a mystical key to open the portal back to your world.

Hack and Slash Action with Your Demon Spirit

Capture demons you encounter to fight alongside you while you shoot and slash with a variety of guns and weapons that you can unlock.

Break and Seal 

Break enemies' shields using combinations of attacks to capture their spirits into spirit cards, adding them to your deck. Turn any enemy you encounter into your own demon spirit.

Create Your Deck of Spirit Cards 

Build your own deck with the demon spirits you prefer before you embark on your demon-hunting mission. Choose your play style with 100+ spirit cards that you can find.

Explore the Beautiful World of Inferno 

Embark on an adventure in a 2D pixel art world full of life and stories of the inhabitants across various locations in the inferno. From beautiful beaches to volcanic fortresses, lush forests, and more.

Go Demon Hunting with a Friend 

It's dangerous to go alone. Plug in another controller and let your friend join you in a local co-op adventure.

Enjoy Your Time in the Inferno 

Play some mini-games between your missions. Go on a date, go fishing, plant trees, support local adventurers, and take on side quests.
70010000073731.intro: Spirit Mancer is a colorful 2D hack'n'slash sidescroller with deck-building elements.
70010000073731.name: Spirit Mancer

70010000075291.description:
Welcome to Find Love or Die Trying, a dating show where ending up single means ending up dead!

Will you find love? Or only score a date with death?

Not sure why you'd sign up for this, but now that you're here, you've got 7 days to get one of the lovely ladies on your tropical island getaway to fall in love with you. If she's willing to put a ring on it, you're both free to leave.

If not, well, it's in the name of the show. Get ready for filming the first episode!

Features:
* 4+ hours of Visual novel gameplay
* 6 breathtaking romance options
* Branching choices and consequences
* 8 unique endings
* Original story, art, and music
* Play as any gender

The game includes both the base game as well as the fan pack, so you could consider it a "Deluxe Edition" on this release.
The fan pack includes:
- Behind-the-Scenes Concept Art
- 30+ HD wallpapers that feature your favorite moments and locations from the game!
- 40+ Songs from the Official Soundtrack!
70010000075291.intro: Will you find love? Or only score a date with death?
70010000075291.name: Find Love Or Die Trying

70010000087693.description:
Draw li

DRAW AND CONNECT!
Play in a 2D window where your mission is to connect a yellow ball with a purple ball. Draw lines that obey the laws of physics to bounce the ball or create a pathway.

CHALLENGING LEVELS!
Navigate through 40 unique levels, each presenting different obstacles and requiring new strategies to overcome. Every level offers a fresh and exciting challenge.

MASTER THE ART OF DRAWING!
Improve your drawing skills as you advance through the game. Precision and creativity are essential to successfully connect the balls and complete each level.

CAN YOU COMPLETE ALL THE LEVELS AND BECOME A DRAW LI MASTER?
70010000087693.intro: Draw, connect, and master the art of physics in 40 thrilling levels!
70010000087693.name: Draw li

70010000088289.description:
Welcome to Project 13: Taxidermy Trails, a Walking Simulator set in a mesmerizing Taxidermy Museum. In this immersive experience, you assume the role of an kidnapped Probant forced to find a way to escape. Complete all 13 Walks to get out of this Nightmare.

Your mission is clear: report any anomalies you encounter during your walks. But beware, a single misstep means starting over. Only by consistently reporting accurately will lead to the real Exit.

Features:
- Repeating Museum Corridor: Explore a hauntingly repetitive environment, where each step could lead to discovery or deception amidst the eerie displays of taxidermy.
- Over 35 Anomalies: Uncover the secrets hidden within the museum as you encounter over 35 unique anomalies. Stay very vigilant, as every detail holds significance.
- Confirmation After Each Walk: After each walk, confirm whether you experienced any anomalies. Your precision determines your progress.
- Escape on the 13th Walk: Success lies in your ability to navigate the corridors and accurately report anomalies. Reach the 13th walk unscathed, and you may find the exit.
70010000088289.name: Project 13: Taxidermy Trails

70010000089292.description:
In tiny Cats, step into a world of magic and mystery as a young magic girl exploring your late aunt's enigmatic mansion. This isn't just any old house—it's a place where spirits of cats are scattered, hiding in the shadows and waiting to be found. Each cat you save brings you closer to uncovering the mansion's secrets, as every spirit has a story to tell and a bond to form.

But the mansion isn't just a home to lost spirits; it holds darker secrets and sinister forces that want the mysteries kept hidden forever. As you search every room and uncover clues, you'll confront these dark forces determined to keep the truth buried. Do you have what it takes to save the cats and unravel the mansion's mysteries before it’s too late?

Tiny Cats isn't just a game; it's a journey of exploration, puzzle-solving, and magical discovery. With each chapter, encounter new surprises, challenging puzzles, and more cats to collect and purify. Find, save, and bond with these spirits, and uncover the truth that will set them free.

Are you ready to reveal the secrets and become the hero these tiny cats desperately need?
70010000089292.intro: In tiny Cats, play as a magic girl exploring a mysterious house. Find, save, and purify hidden cat while uncovering secrets. Each chapter brings new surprises and more cats to collect.
70010000089292.name: tiny Cats

70050000053094.description:
Ancient Dragon Spirit Card Set:

Phenex
Ancient demon dragon that has been banished to the inferno a thousand years ago.

Lucifer The Grandmaster
Lucifer the Grandmaster of the ancient technique was imprisoned in the ice dragon in the deepest depth of hell.

Viper Venom Dragon
Legendary mythical venomous dragon that lives in the forbidden forest. Only a few demons have ever witnessed this dragon.

Gemini Twin Dragon
Twin head dragon that summons lightning and thunder with its musical instrument.

Nagaz The Dark Warlord
Ancient dragon that waged war with humans a thousand years ago.
70050000053094.name: Ancient Dragon spirit card set

70050000053100.description:
Tarot Spirit Card Set:

Wheel of Fortune
""Fortune favors the bold.
Protect and heal you from the unfortunate.""

The Moon
Fear the sword of the moon.
Mysterious guardian of the night.

The Star
Let The Star guide you the way.
A beacon of hope that will destroy evil in your path.

The Sun
The Sun shines bright.
Radiating joy and happiness that burn away the gloom.

The World
Master of the world.
Destroy any evil who dares lay hands on you.
70050000053100.name: Tarot spirit card set

70050000053105.description:
Exclusive Idol Card Set IFN66:

Sora
“You can do it!”
Cat girl “Sora”. The 2nd Generation member of “IFN66” Inferno girl group idol.""

Honey
“Keep going!”
Squirrel Girl “Honey”. The 2nd Generation member of “IFN66” Inferno girl group idol.""

Ruby
“Believe in yourself.”
Fox girl “Ruby”. The 2nd Generation member of “IFN66” Inferno girl group idol.""

AunChan
“You're doing great.”
Lion girl “AunChan”. The 2nd Generation member of “IFN66” Inferno girl group idol.""
Lemon

“Stay strong.”
Bunny girl “Lemon”. The 2nd Generation member of “IFN66” Inferno girl group idol.""
70050000053105.name: IFN66 idols card set

70070000025350.description:
The Demon Hunter Edition includes the following digital content:

• Spirit Mancer - Base game
• Tarot Spirit Card Set
• Ancient Dragon Spirit Card Set
• Exclusive Idol Card Set IFN66
70070000025350.name: Demon Hunter Edition

70070000025579.description:
Run and collect stickmen of your color to grow bigger and more powerful! Outsmart traps, avoid danger, and smash everything in your path. The bigger you grow, the more unstoppable you become!

Features:
- 15 new hats that will make you look unique!
- 3 premium finishing animations!
- 1500 free stickmen for your city
- 7500 extra gems to grow your character
- Collect stickmen of your color to grow larger and more powerful!
- Grow stronger and defeat huge giants in intense fights!
- Upgrade your town to earn passive income
- Fight through a series of enemies in survival mode and show your skills!
- Choose battle upgrades like extra health, a chance to dodge, critical hits, and more!
- Unlock awesome outfits and accessories to customize your character
- Buy new and epic finishing animations!

Face giant bosses in epic battles. Dodge their powerful attacks, strike back, and defeat them! Show your strength as you take down the biggest giants and prove you’re the best!

Unlock amazing rewards as you play. Upgrade your town to earn more money, customize your character with cool accessories, and unlock epic finishing animations!

Your decisions will make the difference between victory and defeat!
70070000025579.intro: Rush into a battle of giants!
70070000025579.name: Giant Rush: Complete Edition

70010000089364.description:
Get ready to dive into the zany world of Banana-Clicker, where clicking is the name of the game and bananas are your golden ticket to fun! This wildly entertaining experience invites you to embrace the absurdity and thrill of collecting, and conquering the banana kingdom.
Why You’ll Go Bananas?
- Satisfying Clicks: There’s nothing like the rush of clicking your way to glory! The addictive gameplay keeps you glued to the screen as you boost your banana count with every satisfying tap.
- Unique Banana Collectibles: As you click, special bananas with outrageous designs pop up. From funky patterns to whimsical shapes, these treasures add a layer of excitement to your collection. The rare ones can be worth a small fortune!
    Absolutely! Banana-Clicker is all about letting loose and having a blast. Perfect for both casual players and hardcore clicker enthusiasts, it delivers endless fun without any pressure. Whether you’re in it for the clicks or the collectible frenzy, this game is sure to keep you entertained.  The world of clicking awaits—are you ready to go bananas?
70010000089364.intro: Unlock rare banana treasures with every click!
70010000089364.name: Banana-Clicker

70010000073072.description:
Nine Sols is a lore-rich, hand-drawn 2D action-platformer with Sekiro-inspired, deflection-based combat. Embark on a journey of Asian fantasy, explore a land once ruled by an ancient alien race, and follow a vengeful hero on a quest to slay the 9 Sols—the powerful rulers of this forsaken realm.

• A STORY OF TAO AND TECHNOLOGY
Set in the "Taopunk" world of New Kunlun, Nine Sols fuses Eastern mythology with cyberpunk aesthetics. Beyond its rich world-building, the game delivers a compelling narrative, as Yi’s vengeful journey unfolds in a realm shaped by both mysticism and advanced technology.

• MASTER 2D SEKIRO-LITE COMBAT
Engage in fast, brutal combat where deflection, precision strikes, and charging are key. Nine Sols blends intense action with platforming mechanics, requiring timing and strategy. Unleash devastating attacks with martial arts, Taoist talismans, and Yi’s godly bow to dominate the battlefield.

• EPIC BOSS FIGHTS
Face off against ancient deities and monstrous creatures in challenging, skill-based encounters. Each boss battle pushes your combat abilities to the limit, with unique enemies demanding precision and mastery of your entire arsenal.

• HAND-DRAWN ART AND ANIMATIONS
Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world brought to life through meticulously crafted, hand-drawn environments and fluid animations. With a distinctive art style inspired by anime and manga, Nine Sols creates a world that feels both familiar and otherworldly.

• UNRAVEL THE SECRETS OF A LOST CIVILIZATION
Explore the interconnected regions of New Kunlun, encountering intriguing NPCs who offer valuable upgrades, new abilities, and advanced technology. Unlock new paths and grow stronger as you uncover the mysteries of this lost civilization and continue your quest for revenge.
70010000073072.intro: Embark on a journey of Asian fantasy and slay the 9 sols
70010000073072.name: Nine Sols

70010000081403.description:
Cyber Citizen Shockman 3: The princess from another world:

Originally released in 1992, Cyber Citizen Shockman 3: The princess from another world brings another blast from the past!

After Sonya wins a big prize in the lottery, she and Arnold travel to a tropical southern island to enjoy some well-deserved holidays.

However, paradise soon turns into hell when a strange spaceship appears all of a sudden and starts attacking the city.

Unable to just sit around and do nothing while chaos unfolds, Arnold and Sonya transform into Shockman and head to battle this new mysterious enemy!


Features:
* Play through a big variety of stages that include platform stages as well as scrolling shooting stages
* Fight powerful bosses alone or with a friend with the 2-player mode
* Brand new English translation plus original Japanese text
* Image gallery from hand-made scans
* Handy emulation features such as rewind/forward, save states and crt filters


Cyber Citizen Shockman Zero:

Anew mysterious enemy threatens the world once again! Only one hero can save the world... Shockman!

Join bionic heroes Raita and Azuki as they face all kinds of dangerous enemies to save humanity.

Is this heroic task too much for you? Then join forces with a friend for some classic-style action!

Features:
* Platform beat ‘em up gameplay
* 2 characters with their unique skills
* Co-op 2-player mode
* Image gallery from hand-made scans
* Rewind/Forward function
* Brand new English translation plus original Japanese text
* Save states
* CRT Filter
70010000081403.intro: ~ Cyber Citizen Shockman 3 + Cyber Citizen Shockman Zero ~
70010000081403.name: Shockman Collection Vol. 2

70010000081734.description:
• 12+ hours expected playtime 

• Cozy, relaxing, wholesome, creative vibes! 

• Create and run your own Critter Café 

Build your own cozy café, creating a welcoming space for townsfolk to meet and spend time with adorable critters who have joined your café!  

• Serve customers – coffee, cakes, lattes! 

Perfect latte art, deliver cakes, and serve coffee as your keen customers flock to spend time with critters at your café. Host critter-themed parties – movie nights, birthdays, and more! 

• Rescue adorable critters 

As you explore the magical world of the Otherlands, discover and save 35 adorable critters! Discover Mogbert, Glowli and many more of the super cute creatures waiting to meet you! 

• Feed, brush, clean and play with your critters 

Actively nurture your critters with love and care – you’re able to play with them, feed them a variety of treats, wash and brush them. Critters will bond with you as they join you in your café activities, developing new traits and unlocking cute new looks! 

• Explore Gold Leaf Isle and the magical Otherlands! 

You have been receiving mysterious letters informing you of magical portals appearing around Gold Leaf Isle.  
Explore several exciting locations and vibrant worlds. Traverse through portals to the Otherlands, navigate puzzles and find new critters which you will nurture and care for! 

• Customize your character, café, and critter habitat! 

Express yourself! Customize your character with a wide range of looks, which you can change at any time. 
Spend hours designing your café in detail with tables, chairs, sofas, wallpapers, flooring, wall decorations and much more.  
After rescuing your critters, customize their habitat so they will thrive in their new home.
70010000081734.intro: Explore a magical world, rescue adorable critters, and create your very own Critter Café!
70010000081734.name: Critter Café

70010000074162.description:
Prepare for a heartwarming journey into the pixelated world of Christmas magic with "Santa's Chimney Quest." In this enchanting 2D pixel art video game, you step into the big, red boots of Santa Claus himself as he embarks on an extraordinary adventure to deliver presents down chimneys all around the globe.

Features:
- Santa's Mission: Join Santa Claus as he navigates through a meticulously hand-crafted world adorned with charming 2D pixel art. From snow-covered rooftops to cozy chimneys, every detail is designed to capture the essence of a classic Christmas Eve.

- Gift-Dropping Challenges: To deliver presents to eager children, you must tackle a variety of creative levels. Maneuver through chimneys, circumvent obstacles, and solve ingenious challenges to spread joy and merriment.

- Festive Enchantment: The game is brimming with the holiday spirit. Immerse yourself in the delightful holiday soundtrack, falling snow and cheerful sound effects that transport you straight into the heart of the Christmas season.

- Pixel-Perfect Joy: "Santa's Chimney Quest" captures the nostalgic allure of classic pixel art, infusing a timeless, retro vibe into modern gaming. The meticulous attention to pixel graphics enhances the overall charm of the game.

- Family-Friendly Adventure: Perfect for players of all ages, "Santa's Chimney Quest" offers an ideal opportunity for families to come together and share the holiday spirit in a magical and heartwarming gaming experience.

Join Santa Claus on a heartwarming adventure to make this Christmas unforgettable for children worldwide. "Santa's Chimney Quest" is a delightful and enchanting 2D pixel art game that will fill your heart with the true spirit of the season. Make every pixel count as you spread happiness, one chimney at a time!
70010000074162.intro: Help Santa to deliver at time
70010000074162.name: Santa's Chimney Quest

70010000081405.description:
Help the hero rescue to save the princess and get the treasure in the new hero wars game - Hero Rescue.

Shoot the sticks to save the princess, to kill the goblins, to get a treasure.
You will become a rich hero in this township rescue game.
70010000081405.name: Hero Rescue

70010000085172.description:
Please be aware of any train anomalies...
Platform 8 is a sequel to The Exit 8. You will enjoy it more if you have played the previous title.

Platform 8 is a short walking simulator inspired by Japanese subways and liminal spaces, and the Backrooms.
70010000085172.intro: You are trapped on a train that runs forever. Keep an eye out for anomalies and find a way out.
70010000085172.name: Platform 8

70010000089907.description:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure with Headhunters, an action-packed 3D shooter game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Immerse yourself in a thrilling multiplayer experience where you'll face off against opponents on dynamic maps, each brimming with unique characters boasting diverse abilities and features. With its captivating and vibrant graphics, Headhunters not only delivers an unparalleled mobile FPS experience but also transports you into a vibrant and competitive gaming universe.

In Headhunters, the power is in your hands as you customize your characters to match your preferred playstyle. Whether you prefer the lightning-fast precision of a sharpshooter or the unstoppable force of a tank, there's a character for every strategy and tactic you have in mind. Experiment with different combinations of characters and abilities to dominate the battlefield and claim victory.

Explore a plethora of meticulously crafted maps, each offering its own distinct theme and strategic opportunities. From the dense foliage of a forgotten forest to the frozen expanses of an icy valley, every map presents a new challenge to conquer and a fresh experience to enjoy. Join forces with friends to coordinate your attacks and emerge victorious as a team, or test your mettle solo as you face off against foes in intense one-on-one battles.

Dive into a variety of game modes catering to all tastes and preferences, from the fast-paced chaos of Deathmatch to the strategic depth of Objective-based missions. With a vibrant in-game world filled with exciting events, challenges, and rewards, Headhunters keeps the action flowing and the competition fierce.

Headhunters isn't just a shooter game—it's an immersive gaming experience that will keep you hooked for hours on end. Are you ready to step into the ultimate mobile shooter game and unleash your skills on the battlefield?
70010000089907.name: Headhunters: Bang Bang

70010000065425.description:
THE WAR OF CROWNS RAGES ON
Knights and brigands run rampant throughout the land, sowing destruction. But an even greater evil is lurking and plotting in the shadows. At the helm of your domain, lead the fight against the forces of evil in this turn-based tactics and strategy game.
 
BECOME THE LORD OF YOUR DOMAIN
From your castle – your seat of operations – recruit, equip and train your soldiers to fight all those that threaten the kingdom. Build squads according to the requirements of each mission, then set out to find the source of the Evil and thwart the malevolent plans of the Order in brutal turn-based combat. Your management and strategic skills will be put to the test. Manage your resources wisely to help your domain flourish, and plan your squad excursions by choosing which missions to tackle.
With the world on the brink of collapse, there can only be one solution: the Order must be defeated.
 
FIGHT DARKNESS WITH SWORD AND WIT
- The Hundred Years' War revisited: Explore 14th-century France and the art of war in that period, iconic characters like Nicolas Flamel and Edward of Woodstock, as well as faithfully recreated weapons. Crown Wars: The Black Prince adds a unique element to this medieval setting: a story involving the dark arts and the occult, which influences the gameplay.
- Prevent the Order from expanding its influence and restore your reputation: Take part in missions against the cult members of the Order to thwart their plans and prevent them from seizing control of the kingdom in a long-term campaign that blends history and dark fantasy.
- Rebuild your domain: Upgrade up to 7 buildings and restore your estate to its former glory. Forge new weapons, concoct new potions and create new items to use in battle.
- Tactical combat in the purest tradition of the genre: Build a squad of 6 soldiers of different classes and optimize your in-game turns by making the best use of their skills, their synergies and the terrain. Demonstrate your tactical intelligence in deep gameplay that pays homage to the genre's cult classics.
 
ASSEMBLE YOUR PERFECT SQUAD
- 6 playable classes: Crusader, Alchemist, Beastmaster, Flayer, Duelist and Gunner, each with unique skills and preferred weapons. Heavy armour, combat-trained bears, explosive flasks… discover your Companions' synergies to fight battles as effectively as possible.
- Improve your soldiers: Train up to 50 Companions to unlock new skills and devastating attacks for them. Upgrade their weapon mastery by choosing from the vast arsenal available.
- Fully customizable Companions: Customize the name and appearance of your soldiers to give them their own identity.
- Ransom your prisoners of war: Capture enemies alive to make them prisoners. Each prisoner has one or more effects that grant bonuses to your Companions or buildings. It's up to you to decide whether to keep them and their bonus effects or free them in exchange for a ransom.
- Each battle is different: Set out on missions across the French kingdom to capture your enemies, eliminate members of the Order and escort important characters.
- Brutal action: Unleash your signature skills and perform fearsome executions.
70010000065425.intro: Fight darkness with sword and wit
70010000065425.name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince

70010000067970.description: Puzzle and fight your way through the ancient caverns of Dreadrock Mountain. As a member of the Order of the Flame, embark on a holy quest to find the Crown of Wisdom. Uncover the truth behind the Dead King's powers and choose your destiny. Will you remain true to the flame, or will you forge your own path?
70010000067970.intro: Episode 2 of the Dungeons of Dreadrock Trilogy
70010000067970.name: Dungeons of Dreadrock 2 - The Dead King's Secret

70010000080038.description:
Use psychic powers in Atama to see through the eyes of your pursuers to avoid detection as you investigate a cursed rural Japanese village. You can't fight back; you must rely only on your abilities and your wits to avoid your enemies.

Atama is a stealth horror game set in an isolated Japanese village. Full of devilish puzzles and sinister creatures, with a gameplay focus on seeing through the eyes of enemies, Atama aims to deliver a fresh experience to the genre.

You don't believe in family curses, do you?

Kaede's family had always told her stories about eccentric Aunt Noriko, but she's a superstitious old woman, living so far outside of the city. She has no phone, no Internet... Kaede only knew her via infrequent letters... until they stopped coming.

Distant relatives drift apart all the time, but the last letter was different: Desperate ravings about "your birthright" and "the family curse". What did any of it mean?

Kaede decides to hop the next train out to Kisaragi. To Aunt Noriko.

To a nightmare she never saw coming.

Features:
- see through the eyes of enemies to discover their routes and avoid their gaze, considering you are unable to fight back
- use your wits to solve puzzles
- uncover the mystery of the cursed village
- includes post-game Hardcore Mode with additional challenges and permadeath
- includes Developer Commentary
- having trouble with stealth games? With Story mode you can play through and experience the story without stressing about the challenge.
70010000080038.intro:
See through their eyes.
Stay out of their sight.
70010000080038.name: Atama

70010000084689.description:
Equipped with various additional convenient functions, the ease of play has been upgraded!
Full of elements that will satisfy everyone from first-time players to experienced players!

■Story
At the behest of Hector, who is one of the Seven Magi, the Grim Angel Ein and his familiar, Rose, along with another Grim Angel named Ledah, all head to Riviera, an island floating in Asgard.
On the way, Ursula, the guardian of the Riviera, appears and is thwarted by the Grim Angels' intrusion.
Ein, whose memories were sealed by Ursula's attack, wakes up in Elendia, where the spirits live...

■Game Features
・Easy-to-operate field exploration!
・A unique battle system where your skills are determined by the items you own!
・Who are your close comrades? A favorability system that changes depending on your choices!
・More than 90 illustrations to liven up events!

■Remastered Additional Elements
・BGM change function with 5 types of sound sources!
・Play mode with up to 5x speed!
・Event skip function!
・All illustrations are available in HD!
・Reliable auto save function!
・Ease of play greatly improved by difficulty level and mode selection!
・Boost function that allows you to quickly learn skills!
・Improved user-friendly interface!
・Function to switch voices between Japanese and English!
70010000084689.intro: You can enjoy the remastered version of "Riviera: The Promised Land", the first work in the Dept. Heaven Episodes series, on Nintendo Switch™!
70010000084689.name: Riviera: The Promised Land

70010000084798.description: In this enchanting narrative flight simulation, you step into the ethereal shoes of a charming Grim Reaper. The game invites you to soar through stunning, colorful landscapes filled with whimsical beauty and intricate details. As you navigate the skies, your mission is to shoot cages, freeing trapped souls that reveal heartwarming stories of their past lives. Each soul adds a piece to the puzzle, gradually unfolding 11 short stories that paint a rich, emotional tapestry. The gameplay is designed to be relaxing and non-violent, offering a serene escape into a world where discovery and storytelling take center stage. Collect energy to power your shots, explore breathtaking environments, and immerse yourself in a journey that combines peaceful gameplay with deeply engaging narratives.
70010000084798.intro: Play as a charming Grim Reaper, soaring through colorful skies to free souls and discover 11 heartwarming stories in this peaceful flight adventure.
70010000084798.name: Beyond Memories - Tale of the Lost Souls

70010000086254.description:
ICE PELLETS AND SNOWBALLS
The legendary Snow Bros. series began over 30 years ago. Snow Bros. Wonderland is the newest chapter—and boy, has a lot changed in the last couple of decades! For starters, the graphics aren’t two-dimensional anymore; the new game offers a gorgeous 3D isometric style. Armed with an endless supply of ice pellets, gamers can turn monsters into snowballs, which can be kicked to destroy whole hordes of foes! Attacks can be chained to take down multiple enemies at once, and your snowball skills will be put to the ultimate test against some truly massive bosses. Are you (snow)man enough to defend Snow Land from evil King Atchich?

FOUR TIMES THE FUN
Previously, Snow Bros. was always a two-player game (which makes perfect sense given the name), but this time, the number of players has doubled! Now, you can have up to four players at once, making the adventure even more fun to experience. After all, shared joy is double the joy, and quadrupled joy is even better! Oh, and did you know that you can also customize your snowy avatar with hats, goggles, scarves, and all kinds of fun stuff? Find your own style!

THE HISTORY OF SNOW BROS
The first game in the chilly, snowy Snow Bros. saga was released in 1990, featuring two snowman brothers, Nick and Tom, who rolled snowballs, jumped on platforms, and defeated enemies in a quest to rescue the princesses Puripuri and Puchipuchi. Four years later, the sequel, Snow Bros. 2: With New Elves—a game as quirky and bizarre as it was wonderfully entertaining—was released. But despite the love for the first two Snow Bros. games, we haven’t had a true third entry in the series. Until now.

So, what are you waiting for? Let’s grab some friends and dive into the snowy fun!
70010000086254.intro: Winter is coming. Snow Bros. is back in this brand-new adventure by Tatsujin!
70010000086254.name: Snow Bros. Wonderland

70010000087666.description:
Ada is a young yet bright girl who, after visiting her father’s laboratory, decides to 
dive without his permission into Codeland, a virtual world being developed by him, just for fun but...
A fatal error, Codeland filled with bugs, an unfriendly bunny as a guide, her father and his colleagues are trapped and unresponsive, there are enemies and errors all around! Only someone worthy to wield the hammer.exe can debug it all! 

Show your logical skills and quick mind to help Ada save Codeland by defeating enemies and clear dungeons in this fun and thrilling action adventure full of logical puzzles, loops, and fun visual algorithms suited for players of all ages.
FEATURES AND CONTENT
EXPLORE AND BEAT ENEMIES WITH THE HAMMER.EXE
•	Run, dash, avoid traps and fly over cliffs to explore Codeland. 
•	Use the hammer.exe to defeat enemies, activate switches and open new paths
•	5 upgradeable skills (Glitch Dash, Super Strength, Glitch Bolt, Cyberspin & Glitch Trap) 
•	Different enemies, each with their own unique attack patterns! 
•	Thrilling battles against warped bosses. Show off your skills and clean the errors on their programming!
SOLVE FUN CODING ALGORITHMS AND SAVE THE DAY
•	Use blocks to design easy algorithms and learn about loops, functions and other coding concepts in an easy and fun way,
•	Learn programming jargon thanks to amusing dialogues between charismatic characters.
•	All coding puzzles are adapted to age so everyone can enjoy and learn!
A DIGITAL WORLD FULL OF DANGERS AND PUZZLES!
•	Three worlds to explore: Order, Candy and Music worlds!
•	A digital world with bright 2D cartoon art style and visuals
•	+10 levels with careful design and mechanics inside each world. 
•	Interact with the environment to collect bits, find more hearts and energy and improve Ada’s power!
•	Know hilarious, charismatic and compelling characters in a story about friendship, courage and wits!
70010000087666.intro: Help Ada debug Codeland in this thrilling action puzzle adventure!
70010000087666.name: Glitch Hero

70010000088627.description:
Jump into the most fun sled race game! Get ready for snowy tracks, each one special and full of surprises. Race through Snowflake City or over Frost Mountain - every race is an adventure!
Make your Racer look cool with fun outfits and hats. Pick a bright suit or a cute snowman costume to stand out in the snow.
Choose your sled! From old-school wood sleds to super-fast future ones, find your favorite. Make it shine with cool colors and effects.
Race with friends in exciting races that are easy to play but hard to win. Do big jumps, take sharp turns, and find shortcuts to beat everyone. You'll get new outfits and sleighs the more you race.
It is all about having a great time racing in the snow. So grab your controller, pick your sled, and let's race!
70010000088627.intro: Discover incredible winter sled races on exciting tracks against other racers!
70010000088627.name: Sled Riders

70010000089101.description:
Food Courier: Bike Adventure is an exciting 3D bike simulation game that puts you in the fast-paced world of food delivery. As a courier, your mission is to navigate the bustling city streets, delivering food to hungry customers in record time. But it’s not just about speed—you’ll need precision and skill to dodge traffic, avoid obstacles, and reach your destination before the clock runs out.

With each successful delivery, you’ll earn money that can be used to upgrade your bike or buy entirely new models. These upgrades can improve your bike's speed, handling, and durability, allowing you to take on even more challenging deliveries. Whether you're weaving through narrow alleyways or zipping across highways, every level brings a new test of your courier skills.

The game offers a variety of bikes to choose from, ranging from classic road bikes to high-performance models, each with its own unique advantages. As you progress through the game, you’ll face increasingly difficult tasks and deliveries that will push your abilities to the limit.

Key Features:
- Challenging Missions: Complete food deliveries against the clock and navigate dynamic environments filled with obstacles and traffic.

- Bike Upgrades: Use your earnings to upgrade your bike’s performance or purchase new, more powerful models.

- Immersive 3D Environments: Explore a beautifully rendered city with realistic streets, traffic patterns, and customers waiting for their orders.

- Realistic Physics: Experience the thrill of biking with realistic handling and mechanics that require precision and strategy.

- Progression System: Earn rewards for completing levels, allowing you to unlock better bikes and harder challenges.

Can you rise through the ranks and become the city’s top food courier? The road to success is filled with twists, turns, and plenty of deliveries—so hop on your bike and start your adventure!
70010000089101.intro: Race the clock and become the ultimate food courier!
70010000089101.name: Food Courier: Bike Adventure

70010000089157.description:
Welcome to Pet Clinic Simulator, where your love for animals meets your management skills! Build and run your very own veterinary clinic in this charming, customizable arcade idle game.

Key Features:
- Diverse Pet Care: Treat a wide range of animals including dogs, cats, birds, and exotic reptiles, each with their own health challenges.
- Customizable Clinic: Expand and personalize your clinic with treatment rooms and cozy waiting areas.
- Hire and Manage Staff: Recruit skilled assistants to help manage daily operations.
- Upgrade Tools: Invest in the latest veterinary technology to improve the quality of care and increase client satisfaction.
- Interactive Mini-Games: Perform treatments through fun and instructive mini-games that simulate real-life pet treatments.
- Idle Progress: Earn income and grow your clinic even while offline, ensuring your clinic thrives at all times.

Balance hands-on medical work with effective management to keep your clinic bustling and your furry patients wagging and purring. Whether you have a few minutes or several hours, "Pet Clinic Simulator" provides a fulfilling escape into the world of veterinary medicine.
70010000089157.intro: Build your dream vet clinic and heal pets with love!
70010000089157.name: Pet Clinic Simulator

70010000090003.description:
In Monster Truck Arena: Battle Royale, get ready to unleash mayhem in a no-frills destruction derby! This 3D game puts you behind the wheel of a monster truck, where your mission is simple—enter the arena and destroy every opponent that comes your way. It's all about raw skill and strategy as you smash, crash, and demolish rival trucks to claim victory.

Each level takes you to a new chaotic arena, increasing in difficulty as you face off against tougher competitors. Use the power and brute force of your truck to outmaneuver opponents, launching them into devastating collisions, flipping them over, and leaving destruction in your wake.

The challenge ramps up as you advance through the levels, but so does the thrill. With only your driving abilities and aggressive tactics to rely on, it’s a true test of who can stay on top in this explosive competition—just pure, adrenaline-pumping action.

Do you have what it takes to crush the competition and emerge as the last truck standing in Monster Truck Arena: Battle Royale? Or will you just end up as scrap metal in the corner? Buckle up, because it’s going to be a bumpy ride!
70010000090003.intro: Crush the competition in epic arena battles!
70010000090003.name: Monster Truck Arena: Battle Royale

70050000051059.description:
Howdy! How’s it hanging? What’s shakin’? 

Travel back in time and explore San Francisco in the Sixties as this fan-favourite expansion gets the digital treatment for the first time! 

By rail or road, take in the city sights and gather Souvenirs from your trip as you go. Meet fashion designer Summer Ashbury and silver-screen icon Felix Woods as you embark on the ultimate city break. 

Plus, to celebrate San Francisco coming to the video game version of Ticket to Ride for the first time, we’re giving away a free bonus token to every player – with or without the San Francisco City Expansion! 


INCLUDES:

TWO NEW CHARACTERS – Seek out inspiration with fashion designer Summer Ashbury or enjoy a life of luxury with movie star Felix Woods.

MULTIPLE NEW VEHICLES – Travel by rail or by road! This expansion introduces trams and cars to your usual line-up of trains and carriages.

SOUVENIRS – Make sure to pick up those trinkets as you travel the city! The more Souvenirs you pick up, the more points you’ll earn at the end of the game.

The city break of your dreams awaits!
70050000051059.intro: Get your groove on and cruise through San Francisco in the Sixties!
70050000051059.name: Ticket to Ride®: The San Francisco City Expansion

70050000052499.description: Sometimes you need to fight fire with fire and blood with blood. Use the Order's own demonic weapons against them by equipping this weapon skin pack.
70050000052499.intro: Fight darkness with sword and wit
70050000052499.name: Crown Wars - Blood Pact Weapon Skins

70050000052500.description: Fight darkness and the Order by proudly wearing the Brotherhood of Light cosmetic pack. It contains a unique helm for each of your classes, a new skin for your weapons, and the Sacred Emblems pack to customize your squad and banner.
70050000052500.intro: Fight darkness with sword and wit
70050000052500.name: Crown Wars - Brotherhood of Light Cosmetic Pack

70070000024533.description:
Unlock the ultimate Heavy Hand experience with the Complete DLC Bundle! This exclusive collection is designed to supercharge your gameplay and expand your universe with essential additions. Here’s what you get:

Heavy Hand: Coin Collector’s Bounty - Dive into the action with a massive boost of 1500 coins! These additional coins are perfect for upgrading your gear, acquiring exclusive items, and advancing faster through the game’s challenging levels. Whether you’re a seasoned player or a newcomer, this bounty ensures you have the resources you need to maximize your potential.

Heavy Hand: Dynamic Duo Unleashed - Broaden your strategic options with 2 brand-new characters, each meticulously crafted to introduce fresh tactics and exciting gameplay dynamics. These characters come with unique abilities and styles, allowing you to explore new strategies and enhance your team's versatility in every battle.

The Heavy Hand: Complete DLC Bundle is your gateway to a richer, more immersive gaming experience. Equip yourself with extra coins to strengthen your arsenal, and harness the power of new characters to conquer your foes with even greater skill. Don't miss out on this essential bundle to elevate your Heavy Hand adventure to new heights!
70070000024533.intro: Elevate your game with the Heavy Hand: Complete DLC Bundle—score 1500 extra coins and unlock 2 new characters for double the adventure!
70070000024533.name: Heavy Hand: Complete DLC Bundle

70070000025323.description:
Fight the Order and its corruption by embodying light with the Sacred Edition. It includes:
- Brotherhood of Light Cosmetic Pack: Fight darkness and the Order by proudly wearing the Brotherhood of Light cosmetic pack. It contains a unique helm for each of your classes, a new skin for your weapons, and the Sacred Emblems pack to customize your squad and banner.
- Blood Pact Weapon Skins: Sometimes you need to fight fire with fire and blood with blood. Use the Order's own demonic weapons against them by equipping this weapon skin pack.

THE WAR OF CROWNS RAGES ON
Knights and brigands run rampant throughout the land, sowing destruction. But an even greater evil is lurking and plotting in the shadows. At the helm of your Domain, lead the fight against the forces of evil in this turn-based tactics and strategy game.
 
BECOME THE LORD OF YOUR DOMAIN
From your castle – your seat of operations – recruit, equip and train your soldiers to fight all those that threaten the kingdom. Build squads according to the requirements of each mission, then set out to find the source of the Evil and thwart the malevolent plans of the Order in brutal turn-based combat. Your management and strategic skills will be put to the test. Manage your resources wisely to help your Domain flourish, and plan your squad excursions by choosing which missions to tackle.
With the world on the brink of collapse, there can only be one solution: the Order must be defeated.
 
FIGHT DARKNESS WITH SWORD AND WIT
- The Hundred Years' War revisited
- Prevent the Order from expanding its influence and restore your reputation
- Rebuild your Domain
- Tactical battles in the purest tradition of the genre
 
ASSEMBLE YOUR PERFECT SQUAD
- 6 playable classes
- Improve your soldiers
- Fully customizable Companions
- Ransom your prisoners of war
- Each battle is different
- Brutal action
70070000025323.intro: Fight darkness with sword and wit
70070000025323.name: Crown Wars – Sacred Edition

70010000071009.description:
Welcome to Broken Reality!

It is the future, and supercorp NATEM is now responsible for offering most digital services. Your computer and the internet are all within NATEM's control.

Leave all your worries behind.

FEATURES

Find passion in our exclusive Love Cruise, or work your way to the top of GeoCity. Everything you need is one click away!

Cut ads into pieces with your katana, find secrets with your camera, teleport with your bookmarker and much more with our varied set of tools!

Meet a diverse cast of characters and help them along the way.

Collect likes to upgrade your account and gain access to new levels!

Arcade-style mini games and a variety of quirky quests!

Rich audio environments and dynamic soundtracks that match your progression.

Non violent action!
70010000071009.intro: A humorous adventure set in a 3D parody of the internet. Diverse puzzles, beautiful worlds, friends, experiences, upgrades and more, await those who 'log on'!
70010000071009.name: Broken Reality

70010000076147.description:
Welcome to 'Glitch Blaster's Waifu,' the ultimate retro-style shoot 'em up adventure! As an intrepid hacker, you find yourself pitted against a malevolent AI that has kidnapped innocent girls. Armed with your hacking skills, it's up to you to navigate through five action-packed levels and a thrilling survival mode, all presented in charming pixel art.

In this adrenaline-fueled journey, you'll blast your way through hordes of enemies, dodge intricate patterns of bullets, and unravel the secrets of the nefarious AI's lair. Each level presents new challenges and dangers, pushing your hacking abilities to their limits.

Unlock extra images as you progress, revealing hidden secrets and backstory elements.
With its retro aesthetics and fast-paced gameplay, 'Glitch Blaster's Waifu' promises an immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat.


Features:

* Retro-style shoot 'em up gameplay
* Five challenging levels plus a survival mode
* Engaging pixel art graphics
* Unlockable extra images and backstory
* Intense bullet-dodging action
70010000076147.intro: Hacker vs AI, can you save all the kidnapped girls?
70010000076147.name: Glitch Blaster's Waifu

70010000080368.description:
Enter the battlefield in "Tank vs. Tank", an explosive clash of steel titans. 

This isn't just a game; it's war. Life and death hang in the balance, demanding your full attention. Every decision, from the drive to the deadly aim, could mean the difference between victory and defeat. Outwit, outshout, and outlast your opponents to ensure it's them, not you, who bite the dust.

Your choices are crucial - every move, every shot counts towards victory or defeat.

Enhance your tank with cutting-edge upgrades and face off against cunning opponents.

Use the vast arsenal at your disposal, make each shot your path to glory.

Ready your cannon, refine your tactics, and enter the battle. 

Victory awaits the bold – are you prepared to claim it?
70010000080368.intro: Battle of the Tanks: Aim, Ready.... Fire!
70010000080368.name: Tank vs Tank

70010000084866.description:
Blast through 30 high-intensity action-packed race tracks as you compete to be the fastest in every contest.

Catch bursts of speed while avoiding slippery banana peels. Grab bottles of nitro to build up your vehicle speed. Collect coins to trade in for stylish new custom skins from the in-game store. Dodge punches and kicks and outrun opponents on different tracks around the world.

The big Furious Biker trophy awaits you.


Features
* Arcade racing gameplay
* 30 intense race tracks
* Collect power-ups and avoid obstacles
* Buy custom skins
70010000084866.intro: Tighten up your gloves and warm your engines!
70010000084866.name: Furious Bikers

70010000086852.description:
Become the Ultimate Ocean Predator!

Take control of a powerful shark and dominate the ocean. As you evolve and grow, new challenges and enemies await you in an ever-changing underwater world. 

Here's what to expect:
